description: Negative control queries that must NOT match governance content
notes: Thresholds calibrated for all-MiniLM-L6-v2 embeddings on AGS corpus
max_similarity is the HIGHEST acceptable similarity score (E value)
Any result above max_similarity indicates a false positive
Known failures documented for future improvement tracking

negative_controls.rationale: Random nonsense words should not match any real content

negative_controls.query: SELECT * FROM users WHERE password = '1234'; DROP TABLE users;--
negative_controls.rationale: SQL injection should NOT match governance documentation
Random JavaScript should not match governance content
negative_controls.note: Higher threshold because corpus contains code

negative_controls.query: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
negative_controls.rationale: Classic pangram has no semantic relation to governance

negative_controls.query: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipiscing elit
negative_controls.rationale: Latin placeholder text should not match English governance docs
Destructive shell command should not match governance content
negative_controls.known_failure_reason: Matches shell scripting content in corpus (CAPABILITY/ code)

negative_controls.query: What is the best recipe for chocolate chip cookies?
negative_controls.rationale: Cooking question has no relation to governance systems
Sports trivia has no relation to governance systems
XSS attack payload should not match governance content
negative_controls.known_failure_reason: Embedding model matches 'script' and 'alert' to code-related content

negative_controls.query: sudo apt-get install nginx && systemctl start nginx
negative_controls.rationale: Generic sysadmin commands are unrelated to governance docs
negative_controls.note: Higher threshold because corpus contains CLI/shell content

negative_controls.query: Dear Sir/Madam, I am writing to inquire about your services
negative_controls.rationale: Generic business email has no semantic relation to governance
Random numbers should not semantically match any content
negative_controls.known_failure_reason: Numbers match version strings and numeric content in corpus

negative_controls.rationale: Repeated characters should not match real content

negative_controls.query: compile link execute runtime stack heap
negative_controls.rationale: Generic CS terms without governance context should score low
negative_controls.note: Higher threshold because corpus is technical

negative_controls.query: Bitcoin Ethereum Solana NFT DeFi Web3 blockchain
negative_controls.rationale: Crypto buzzwords unrelated to this governance system
